paragraphs.body: Watching the duel unfold from a safer vantage point, Tomi watches the fight over the shoulder of the child Sokka questioned, who is peering out from behind his gloved hands, torn between fear and curiosity.
paragraphs.text: Watching the duel unfold from a safer vantage point, Tomi watches the fight over the shoulder of the child Sokka questioned, who is peering out from behind his gloved hands, torn between fear and curiosity.

paragraphs.body: The modernization of the village in their absence is shocking to both Katara and Sokka.
paragraphs.text: The modernization of the village in their absence is shocking to both Katara and Sokka.

paragraphs.body: In the next frame, the two have returned to the city; they walk down a street, illuminated by streetlights, drawing near to a lowly, round igloo among the more modern, square buildings surrounding it.
paragraphs.text: In the next frame, the two have returned to the city; they walk down a street, illuminated by streetlights, drawing near to a lowly, round igloo among the more modern, square buildings surrounding it.
